attributes.action: We demand the dissolution of Goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the fiasco surrounding the expenses scandal we demand that the Prime Minister dissolves parliment and calls for elections to be held.
The people of this country are entitled be represented by honest politicians that DO NOT cheat the tax payer for all they can get and only show remorse when they are caught.
WE THE PEOPLE OF ENGLAND ARE WORTH MORE THAN THIS AND DEMAND TO BE REPRESENTED BY POLITICIANS THAT ARE HONEST AND REPECTFUL OF THOSE THAT THEY REPRESENT

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
